backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing access control, user profile management, and resume CRUD operations with role enforcement and automatic user role assignment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference listing of frontend files with short descriptions summarizing their roles within the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and dark mode styles using custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the UI in a theme provider and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright text, branding link, and a privacy policy link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with app branding, sync status indicator, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout including header, footer, route outlet, and automatic sync trigger when online and authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI handling login/logout via Internet Identity and showing basic user info.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting newly authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/ResumeEditorForm: Form component for editing resume title, personal info, and summary, updating parent state on change.
Displays online/offline sync status with tooltips showing last sync time and pending changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend once an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout within a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query wrappers for CRUD operations on backend resumes and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumes.ts: Merges local and backend resumes, handles offline-first resume CRUD, and syncs changes when online.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the app’s privacy policy page with sections describing data storage, permissions, photo handling, and tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditor.tsx: Provides a resume editing interface that loads a resume, tracks unsaved changes, and saves updates via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ResumesDashboard.tsx: Displays a dashboard of resumes with create, delete, duplicate, and rename actions plus dialogs and error handling.
frontend/src/storage/resumeLocalStore.ts: Implements local resume CRUD using localStorage with versioning and an in-memory fallback when storage is unavailable.
frontend/src/storage/resumeSyncQueue.ts: Manages a local sync queue for pending resume operations, storing and clearing queued actions with timestamps.
frontend/src/types/resume.ts: Defines TypeScript types and defaults for resume content, formatting, sections, and related entities.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Provides utilities to extract user-friendly error messages and detect storage-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s versioned state, listing implemented features and metadata for the resume builder app.
